abstract: Verizon Communications is set to announce free, ad-supported mobile streaming service called G090, which will feature a mix of live events, prime-time television and original web series; service will be available to all users, not just Verizon customers.
lead_paragraph: Aimed at millennials, the service, Go90, will be available to all users, not just Verizon customers. It will include shows from Comedy Central, Food Network, ESPN, NFL Network and Discovery.

headline.main: Verizon to Offer Free Mobile TV, With an Eye on Millennials
headline.print_headline: Verizon to Offer Free Mobile TV Service, Hoping to Draw Millennials

snippet: Aimed at millennials, the service, Go90, will be available to all users, not just Verizon customers. It will include shows from Comedy Central, Food Network, ESPN, NFL Network and Discovery.
